Reviews.Title: Great basic phone
Reviews.Author: Hawaiianelle
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for nearly 2 years and it has never given my problems.  It is well made, has good audio reception and much better made than the Razor I had prior to this.  I do not use text or online services with my phones but you can do both with this one.  It is easy to accidentally press the web key so I disabled mine.  There is an alarm feature I use but the thing I like best is I can hear well with this phone.  Many others have poor sound quality.  I've read about others having dropped calls.  I ordered one of those peel and stick phone antennas from cellphoneshop.com and it works great on all my cell phones for better reception.  I can get calls even when I am inside a store or building.  I do like the customized ring tones you can set for your friends and the picture to caller feature too.  I'm looking for another phone for my husband who seems to like my phone better than his.

Reviews.Title: very cute phone
Reviews.Author: Curly Sue "Sumi"
Reviews.Content: This phone is very sleek and has very cool applications although I haven't fully explored all its features.  It's the perfect phone for someone who wants a nice phone but is not overly fussy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent KRZR K1 phone - works great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "AV1422"
Reviews.Content: I've had a silver krzr k1 for 2 and a half years and it gave me no problems until the buttons recently wore out from using it so much. I just bought another one, this time red, and it's proving to be just as great as the first one. It has all the features I need (camera, texting) but if you are looking for internet this is not the phone for you! I would recommend this phone to someone looking for a basic phone but who also knows how to use the technology - it could be overwhelming as a "first phone."

Reviews.Title: m m soto
Reviews.Author: mane
Reviews.Content: Disapointed.. no instruction manual, it is not operating properly,  and if l had none it was coming from china, l would not have bought it.  take too long to receive.  l bought 2 phones from same company, 3 years ago. payed for 2, and received one.  and never resolved...m m soto

Reviews.Title: Love these phones but voice quality unacceptable
Reviews.Author: E. Parrish
Reviews.Content: I had a RAZR for years and loved it. Last month I bought a new KRZR K1 from eBay. I love the size and feel and weight of these phones. When I called people they asked what was wrong with the connection. The eBay seller was great and sent me another. I then tested the voice quality of the KRZR K1 with the basic Motorola that Consumer Cellular offers and an LG Shine 2. Everyone told me to throw the KRZR K1 away because of its horrible sound quality. The basic Motorola has OK quality but the LG Shine 2 was absolutely clear. Again, I love the size and feel of this phone and wish Motorola would make an updated version. But I don't think any buyer will be happy with these - technology has passed this 2006 or so model by and Motorola has not made one that isn't a smart phone that competes that I know of. I could hear folks just fine but they said it sounded like I was in a tunnel. Keep shopping and leave this one behind I think.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for travel out of country
Reviews.Author: Allan Brandt "Big Al"
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone for travel out of country. Not too expensive if it gets stolen, trim, slim, full features with camera, video, address book, unlocked and takes all SIM cards

Reviews.Title: Refurbished phone
Reviews.Author: Jeranderson
Reviews.Content: Te venden el teléfono y supuestamente es nuevo pero es reconstruido!!!They sell the phone and supposedly is new but is refurbished!!!

Reviews.Title: does work right
Reviews.Author: rocoker
Reviews.Content: the phone is okay the design is fine but when use the speaker it brakes up and i  cannot use the speaker button

Reviews.Title: Motorola
Reviews.Author: Marie Wilson
Reviews.Content: didn't work with straight talk and sim card didn't fit couldnt bet back off and not what I expected but the color is what I wanted but this type of phone was not for me

Reviews.Title: hooray 4 lil phone
Reviews.Author: John Rohner
Reviews.Content: works great on T Mobile - changed to no contract, put in sim add minutes from pay as you go card, done..

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Phone!
Reviews.Author: Nora J Hemphill
Reviews.Content: So great to have this classic phone new!  This is still the greatest cell phone design.  Easy to use, compact design and fits in your pocket. So good I ordered it in 4 colors!  Wonderful!

Reviews.Title: You Get What You Pay For
Reviews.Author: jrachelle
Reviews.Content: So true.  Phone was very inexpensive.  I only needed it to store phone numbers and a few speed dial numbers.  That's it, other than placing calls.  That's what it does.  Plenty of sounds so you''re not stuck with something you absolutely hate.  The back falls off often and it takes a long time for the battery to charge.  If you need just bare-bones-basic, then this is it. Comes with two batteries.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Imron Sarwar
Reviews.Content: The cell phone was nice, great price and quality.  Its small than the razor, good to store in a small space.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: unhappy costomer
Reviews.Content: this phone was locked and could not be re set to orginal settings. Had to have the same phone company as original owner did. Did not say when missed a message.

Reviews.Title: Totally useless to me, incomplete description
Reviews.Author: Zachary Lee
Reviews.Content: Description of phone was not clear as to whether or not it would be compatable with my current carrier. It also did not indicate that the phone did not come with a sim card. Ultimately, the phone was completely useless to me and I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Marvellous
Reviews.Author: Parker
Reviews.Content: THANKS for helping me to get my cute cell phone.I have purchased a Motorola KRZR K1 unlocked cell phone for my personnel use from AmazonAll it's functions and options are marvelous, I like it.The color Fire Red gives me more impression. Also I like the Blue device.It is a very shiny product.Especially the size of the device is also really very good for easy handling.

Reviews.Title: Motorola  ... wink... wink... wink
Reviews.Author: M. Carter "Mom, Cook, Therapist"
Reviews.Content: I seriously doubt that Motorola is involved at all with this phone.  Saying that, it is cheap, and works OK.  I think the main issue is the cheap battery.  My phone started dropping calls after 4 months, and would turn off every time the Bluetooth connected.  All that was fixed with a genuine Motorola BC50 battery.  So, when you buy the phone, also plan on another $20 for a genuine battery.The paint peeled off the battery cover plate on my red phone within 3 months, so is now the original aluminum color.  The front is red plastic, and still looks fine.

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: A.M.
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, chose to return this item. The shipping was prompt, as was the customer service. Unfortunately, there will still pictures from the facility on the phone, and the up arrow on the phone was sketchy and did not light up.

Reviews.Title: the charger dont work
Reviews.Author: lucy
Reviews.Content: i get this phone for my mpther i use with for 2 days i go to charger and i saw is dont charge.the charger dont was for this phone.thats why i put 1 star.but the phone work good is just the charger dont work

Reviews.Title: Terrible phone
Reviews.Author: M. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these to replace phones we already had that were having problems. We had more problems with these than I've had with any other phone. Phones would intermittently turn off, drop calls all the time and were difficult to program. Each of the phones we purchased had different language settings (neither was English) which only made everything that much more frustrating. Replaced these phones again after 6 weeks of constant trouble.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: EC
Reviews.Content: This thing is a waste of money. It drops calls like crazy. I'm even lucky to get any reception on it. Within the first week, the back cover started peeling. If you want a Motorola, stick with the RAZR.

Reviews.Title: Motorola KRZR K1
Reviews.Author: Juliet Kasozi
Reviews.Content: The phone never worked at all !!! I purhased it to us in Africa but couldn't use it. It was a waste of money. I wish I could return it for a refund.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and EDGE/GPRS data capabilities
2-megapixel digital camera with 8x digital zoom; MicroSD expansion; digital audio player
Bluetooth stereo music; access to personal email; web browser; SMS/MMS/EMS messaging
Up to 5.83 hours of digital talk time and 300 hours of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola KRZR K1 Unlocked Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera, MP3/Video Player, MicroSD Slot--International Version with No Warranty (Fire Red)
